C1 in a way that is very good or beautiful, or that deserves to be admired: I thought she coped magnificently. The house is magnificently furnished. See
magnificent
More examplesFewer examplesThe pupils responded magnificently under the direction of their drama teacher. They coped magnificently in hugely trying circumstancesThe entry hall is magnificently decorated with marble sculptures.
